title: Toleration with Operator Exists
description: Create a Pod named ||exists-pod|| in namespace ||venus|| using image ||busybox:1.35|| that tolerates any value for taint key ||tier|| with ||NoSchedule|| effect.

steps: kubectl run exists-pod --image=busybox:1.35 -n venus --dry-run=client -o yaml -- sleep 3600 > pod.yaml

validations.description: Pod should have Exists operator for tier key
